p: Blood samples were collected into 5 mL gold BD Vacutainer SST II advance tubes with gel for serum separation (Becton-Dickinson, USA). Immediately after puncture, samples were stored at 4 °C–8 °C until centrifugation within 12 h. Sera were then frozen and stored at −20 °C until use at the National Reference Center for arboviruses in Institut Pasteur in French Guiana.
